With the "Strap"-type catalog, there is not currently a way to create customers via the Admin, because certain fields, like usernick, will not be set. Additionally, the user will not be able to login with their email, and their username counter will not match any other users.

Rather than re-creating the New Account page here, the best course of action is to log out of the Admin and create the customer on the website.
